T02TD1737E:104b-1: k'a ru na t'a ra sadha nam bod skad du /
T02TD1737E:104b-2: thugs rje sgrol ma'i sgrub thabs zhes bya ba /
T02TD1737E:104b-3: thugs rje nye 'gyur khro mo lha mor ston //
T02TD1737E:104b-4: mtho ris thar pa'i 'gegs rnams sgrol mdzad ma /
T02TD1737E:104b-5: 'jigs pa chen po brgyad skyo bcing //
T02TD1737E:104b-6: 'dod yon lnga yi gdung ba sel //
T02TD1737E:104b-7: phrin las bzhi yis 'gro don mdzad //
T02TD1737E:104b-8: rtag tu sems can mdun du bzhugs //
T02TD1737E:104b-9: gsol pa btab pas mi bslu ba'i //
T02TD1737E:104b-10: sgrol ma ral gcig ma la 'dud //
T02TD1737E:104b-11: bla ma brgyud pa'i bka' drin gyis //
T02TD1737E:104b-12: snyan brgyud zhal nas lung bstan pa'i //
T02TD1737E:104b-13: sangs rgyas nyid kyis gsungs pa ni //
T02TD1737E:104b-15: gsang ba las kyang ches gsang ba //
T02TD1737E:104b-16: zab pa bas kyang zab pa nyid //
T02TD1737E:105a-2: theg chen rigs ldan smin pa des //
T02TD1737E:105a-3: lha yi mtshan ma dur khrod dang //
T02TD1737E:105a-4: khang stong dben la bkra shis par //
T02TD1737E:105a-5: mchod yon zhal zas ldan pa la //
T02TD1737E:105a-6: bsdam bya bsdams par byas nas kyang //
T02TD1737E:105a-8: skad cig legs nyes bdun po gsal //
T02TD1737E:105a-9: 'od kyis srid gsum gsal nas su //
T02TD1737E:105a-10: bsdus te thams cad stong sngags gsal //
T02TD1737E:105a-11: dang po padma dmar po'i steng //
T02TD1737E:105a-12: sa bon padma nang du h'um //
T02TD1737E:105a-13: gri gug h'um bcas byung ba ni //
T02TD1737E:105a-14: ral gcig sgrol ma rje btsun ma //
T02TD1737E:105a-15: g-yon brkyang mgo bo'i phreng bas brgyan //
T02TD1737E:105a-17: padma sngon po ro yi gdan //
T02TD1737E:105a-18: phyi nang gsang ba'i sku mdog 'chang //
T02TD1737E:105a-19: zhal gcig spyan gsum he he bzhad //
T02TD1737E:105a-20: klu brgyad stag gi pags pas dkris //
T02TD1737E:105a-21: bcu drug gnas pa'o mas brgyan //
T02TD1737E:105a-23: rus chen phreng ba ral gri gug / rang rtags bde skyong kham ral gcig / dmar zlum me stag phung po can //
T02TD1737E:105a-24: dbu rgyan dur khrod rin chen spras //
T02TD1737E:105a-25: dgug dang gzhug dang mchod ston nas //
T02TD1737E:105a-26: yi ge gsum ni sngags chen po //
T02TD1737E:105a-27: phat ni mtha' ru snying gar gnas //
T02TD1737E:105a-28: 'od zer lnga dang mnyam du mtshungs //
T02TD1737E:105a-29: mi shes bud shing bsregs pa'o //
T02TD1737E:105a-31: de yi btu ba'i cho ga bshad //
T02TD1737E:105a-32: dang pos yi phar phyogs sbyin //
T02TD1737E:105a-33: dbyangs yig bzhi pas rnam par brgyan //
T02TD1737E:105a-35: thig le zla tshes yang dag ldan //
T02TD1737E:105a-36: de nas t'am yig sbyin par bya //
T02TD1737E:105a-37: bzhi pa nyid kyis rnam par brgyan //
T02TD1737E:105a-38: ring po dag dang yang dag ldan //
T02TD1737E:105a-39: h'um yig yang ni sbyin par bya //
T02TD1737E:105a-40: phat kyi yi ge de nas sbyin //
T02TD1737E:105a-41: yongs rdzogs grub pa'i sngags nyid do //
T02TD1737E:105a-42: spro dang bsdu ba'i sbyor ba yis //
T02TD1737E:105a-44: gsum kha gsal zhing brtan pas so //
T02TD1737E:105a-45: mchog thugs gsum ste kha dog lnga //
T02TD1737E:105a-46: lnga spangs lnga gsal lnga ru 'grub //
T02TD1737E:105a-47: nam mkha' 'brug sgra sprin sangs nas //
T02TD1737E:105a-48: nyi ma zla ba gsal bzhin rgyas //
T02TD1737E:105a-49: shes rab ngos na gnas pa yi //
T02TD1737E:105a-50: 'byung ba'i lha mo gshegs byon nas //
T02TD1737E:105a-51: rang nyid dbyibs kyi rnam pa yi //
T02TD1737E:105a-52: gnyis kyi gcig tu gtubs la rol //
T02TD1737E:105a-53: lnga las lnga 'phros lnga bkug la //
T02TD1737E:105a-54: bha gar thim pas longs spyod bde //
T02TD1737E:105a-55: yid du 'ong ba thams cad la //
T02TD1737E:105a-56: dbyibs dang ngag ni brtan pas bya //
T02TD1737E:105a-57: rgyu ba'i bar chod mi rgod dang //
T02TD1737E:105a-58: sa dang rnal ma ske tshe yang //
T02TD1737E:105a-59: dbang po'i ting 'dzin sngags dang bcas //
T02TD1737E:105b-0: @105b gsal na the tshom mi bya'o //
T02TD1737E:105b-1: gcig nas phyed du 'jam dbyangs bsgrub //
T02TD1737E:105b-2: chu gtsang dkar gsum skyur rtsi la //
T02TD1737E:105b-3: sngags bzlas bsgrubs te tho rangs btung / rigs gsum gtso bo lta bur 'gyur //
T02TD1737E:105b-4: aom pra dzny'a pushtim ku ru ye sv'ah'a /
T02TD1737E:105b-5: phan yon bzhin du 'dod pa yis //
T02TD1737E:105b-6: sku gzugs spyan sngar mchod pa dbul //
T02TD1737E:105b-7: rgyu ba bzang dus gsol btab 'grub //
T02TD1737E:105b-8: bar chad gzugs kyis zhi bar 'gyur //
T02TD1737E:105b-9: aa mu ki pa sha ma n'a ya sv'ah'a /
T02TD1737E:105b-10: tshangs pa khyab 'jug nyi zla dang //
T02TD1737E:105b-11: drag po phyogs skyong 'dod lhas kyang //
T02TD1737E:105b-12: ba spu'i rtse mo'i gnod mi nus //
T02TD1737E:105b-14: skra dkar gnyer ma skad ngan nad //
T02TD1737E:105b-15: dbul ba la sogs mdor bsdus pa //
T02TD1737E:105b-16: nad sogs 'jigs pa che brgyad dang //
T02TD1737E:105b-17: sdug bsngal rab tu 'joms par byed //
T02TD1737E:105b-18: bskul ba med par gos btung dang //
T02TD1737E:105b-19: khang zangs rin chen sogs kyang 'du //
T02TD1737E:105b-20: ral gri dang ni mig sman dang //
T02TD1737E:105b-21: rkang pa bum pa bzang sogs 'grub //
T02TD1737E:105b-22: tshigs bcad mkhan dang snyan dngags mkhan //
T02TD1737E:105b-23: blo rno shes rab dri med 'gyur //
T02TD1737E:105b-24: gzhan yang ci 'dod dgos grub la //
T02TD1737E:105b-26: bdag la bri ba'i mthu med kyang //
T02TD1737E:105b-27: bka' dang bla ma'i gdams pa yis //
T02TD1737E:105b-28: ral gcig ma yi sgrub thabs bkod //
T02TD1737E:105b-29: 'gal gzigs mkhas rnams bzod pa mdzad //
T02TD1737E:105b-30: dad po'i las can dman dang bar ma mchog dag las ;
T02TD1737E:105b-31: / dngos grub skal ba rang rang so sor mos pa rnams //
T02TD1737E:105b-32: dad cing mos pa thams cad mthar phyin rtse mo dgod par bya phyir bris //
T02TD1737E:105b-33: phan yon dgos pa 'di yis gang gis bsgrub pa myur du 'grub par shog / thugs rje sgrol ma'i sgrub thabs dngos grub phreng ba zhes bya ba /
T02TD1737E:105b-34: slob dpon rtag pa'i badzras mdzad pa rdzogs so //
T02TD1737E:105b-35: rgya gar gyi mkhan po pandi ta don yod rdo rje dang /
T02TD1737E:105b-36: bod kyi lo ts'a ba mkhas pa ba ris rgya dpe bod du spyan drangs nas /
T02TD1737E:105b-37: ba sbug rong gi gser khang du bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa//
